text: Shotacon, sometimes shortened to shota (ショタ), is a Japanese slang portmanteau of the phrase Shōtarō complex (正太郎コンプレックス). A Shotacon is described as an attraction to young, or young in appearance, fictional male characters. Category:Anime and manga terms Category:Anime and manga genres The female version is called Lolicon.
title: Shotacon
